hjb.jms
Class HJBRoot

java.lang.Object
  hjb.jms.HJBRoot
public class HJBRoot
extends Object

HJBRoot is the root of an HJB runtime, a registry of the configured Providers.

Author:
Tim Emiola

Field Summary
static String ROOT_COMMAND_RUNNER_NAME
          Constant that holds the name given to the thread which runs the HJBRoot command runner.

Field Detail

ROOT_COMMAND_RUNNER_NAME

public static final String ROOT_COMMAND_RUNNER_NAME
Constant that holds the name given to the thread which runs the HJBRoot command runner.

The value of this constant is "HJB Root Command Runner".

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

HJBRoot

public HJBRoot(File storagePath)
Verifies that storagePath is accessible and starts this HJBRoot's command runner.

Parameters:
storagePath - the path to persist provider details, should this be required.
